title: Life Expectancy & Population
text:
This page shows the relationship between life expectancy and population over time.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gapminder = pd.read_csv('/Users/xipuwang/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv')
for country in gapminder['country'].unique():
    data = gapminder[gapminder['country'] == country]
    plt.plot(data['year'], data['population_millions'], label=country, alpha=0.3)

plt.title('Life Expectancy vs Population')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Populationb (Millions)')
plt.show()

title: Country Analysis
text:
This page presents a detailed analysis of life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for a specific country (USA).

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gapminder = pd.read_csv('/Users/xipuwang/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv')
country = 'United States'
data = gapminder[gapminder['country'] == country]
plt.plot(data['year'], data['life_expectancy'], label='Life Expectancy')
plt.plot(data['year'], data['gdp_per_capita'], label='GDP per Capita')
plt.plot(data['year'], data['population_millions'], label='Population (in millions)')
plt.title(f'Life Expectancy, GDP per Capita, and Population in {country}')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.legend()
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy & GDP
text:
This page shows the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita over time.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gapminder = pd.read_csv('/Users/xipuwang/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv')
for country in gapminder['country'].unique():
    data = gapminder[gapminder['country'] == country]
    plt.plot(data['year'], data['gdp_per_capita'], label=country, alpha=0.3)

plt.title('Life Expectancy vs GDP')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('GDP')
plt.show()
